author: jacopoc
msg: Removed old and unused services for data preparation of the balance sheet.
According to the discussion in the mailing list, moved the depreciation classes from Debit to Credit group; also modified data preparation script for balance sheet and financial time period closing.
Thanks to Adrian Crum and Mike Bates for the valuable information provided.
